titles: The shaking of the olive-tree the remaining works of that incomparable prelate Joseph Hall D. D. late lord bishop of Norwich : with some specialties of divine providence in his life, noted by his own hand : together with his Hard measure, vvritten also by himself.
author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.
Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656. Via media.
publisher: Printed by J. Cadwel for J. Crooke ...,
notes: "Via media.  The way of peace in the five busy article commonly known by the name of Arminius" (p. [351]-388, i.e. [313]-350) has special t.p.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
